General.Name: Shanghai Carthane Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Carthane Co.,Ltd. operates in the auto parts manufacturing industry in China. Its products portfolio includes pedals, accelerator pedals, jounce bumpers, top mounts, callipers, spring seats, shock absorber components for chassis suspension systems and lightweight pedal assemblies for control systems, polyurethane buffer blocks, polyurethane spring pads, and polyurethane shock absorbers, etc. The company offers polyurethane load-bearing wheels in the field of non-automotive parts; and shock absorption components, pedal assemblies and rubber wheels. Its products are used in passenger car market. The company is also involved in exporting activities. Shanghai Carthane Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Shanghai, China.
